title: Initial Launch of the World Baseball Classic Application: Auth Wall  Load
custom_preconds:
Given the application has been installed
And has not previously been launched
But is not updating a previous version of the application on the same device
custom_steps:
When the launcher icon is tapped
And the splash screen has finished loading
custom_expected: Then the Initial Auth Wall should appear.

title: Settings: For MLB.com Account Information, check that existing logins still work
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings menu item.
And we have selected Enter Account Information under MLB.com Account
custom_steps:
When we enter "media6@mlbtest.com" in the Email field
And enter "password" in the Password field
And then tap Done
custom_expected: Then all logins have successfully logged in with a message of Account information verified

title: Settings: Verify changing a users account email will throw a validation error when the user tries to login to the account next
custom_preconds:
Given we have changed the users account email on the WorldBaseballClassic.com website
And the user has selected the Settings menu
And the user has selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account - Enter Account Information
custom_steps: When the user enters their credentials
custom_expected: Then they will receive a validation error message

title: Settings: Verify changing a users account password will throw a validation error when the user tries to login to the account next
custom_preconds:
Given we have changed the users account password on the WorldBaseballClassic.com website
And the user has selected the Settings menu
And the user has selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account - Enter Account Information
custom_steps: When the user enters their credentials
custom_expected: Then they will receive a validation error message

title: Settings: Verify if the user already has stored credentials and the account password or email address is changed that the user will be thrown a validation message the next time they try to access the account
custom_preconds:
Given we have stored the user credentials already
And we have changed the user credentials on the WorldBaseballClassic.com website
And we have selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account
custom_steps: When the password or email address are changed on the account
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted with a validation error that the credentials are no longer valid

title: Settings: All setting changes are preserved when application is quit and relaunched
custom_preconds: Given we have selected the Settings menu
custom_steps:
When we change any of the Settings
And we quit the application
And we open the application
custom_expected: Then the settings changes made are still preserved

title: Settings: When device is changed from Online to Offline mode in the middle of using the application then the user will be notified that they are in Offline mode
custom_preconds:
Given we have entered the Application
And we have navigated around it
And we then have disabled the network connection
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted that they are in Offline Mode
And the user will be prompted about showing Last Available Data
And the user will be able to navigate around the application still

title: Settings: Verify that if we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell that it doesn't highlight blue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell
custom_expected: THEN the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell will NOT be highlighted in blue

title: Settings (Power Management): When Auto-Lock is set to On then the device will lock after a period of time and when Auto-Lock is set to Off then the device will not lock after a period of time
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings menu
And we have tapped on Auto-Lock
custom_steps:
When Auto-Lock is set to On
And Auto-Lock is set to Off
custom_expected: Then the device will either stay unlocked / locked depending on the setting chosen

title: Teams: Favorite Teams can be reorders by utilizing the drag icon to the right of each Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Favorite Teams menu
And we have multiple Favorite Teams set
custom_expected: Then we can drag the Favorite Teams into any order we want

title: Settings: Verify that the 'Social Networks' setting is available in Settings
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we tap on Settings
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Social Networks menu item

title: Settings: Verify that if we navigate throughout the Application that at no point do we see any buttons labeled as "Back"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate throughout the Application
custom_expected:
THEN we will not see any buttons labeled as "Back"
AND any buttons that were previously labeled as 'Back" will now just be labeled with the appropriate area that a user would be going back to

title: Settings: You can't delete and/or reorder Favorite Teams though Settings
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to the Teams page through settings
And has selected several favorite teams
And has tapped the Edit button
custom_steps:
When the user to either add/delete teams
Or re-order the teams in any way
custom_expected:
Then the user will be able to do so without difficulty
And tapping the Done button will save the settings

title: Initial Launch of the World Baseball Classic Application: Auth Wall Load
custom_preconds:
Given the application has been installed
And has not previously been launched
But is not updating a previous version of the application on the same device
custom_steps:
When the launcher icon is tapped
And the splash screen has finished loading
custom_expected: Then the Initial Auth Wall should appear.

title: Settings: Ensure that all the Links and Buttons on the Settings page are clear and bring you to their expected pages
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the Settings menu
custom_steps: When the user clicks on a Link / Button
custom_expected:
Then the user is brought to the expected page

REPEAT for each Link / Button

title: Settings: Verify that the bottom of the Splash Screen doesn't have a solid blue line appearing
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
custom_steps: WHEN we launch the Application on all different configurations
custom_expected: THEN we will not see a blue line at the bottom of the splash screen (especially on a 3rd Gen iPod Touch)

title: Settings (Favorite Teams): Verify you can select a team to be your favorite team by tapping the green plus to the left of that particular team.
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings menu (Gear Icon)
And we have selected Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When we tap a green plus sign next to a team
custom_expected:
Then the green plus sign disappears
And that team moves into the Favorite Teams section

title: Settings (Favorite Teams): Verify you can select multiple Favorite Teams and that they line up under the Favorite Team section by the order you select them in
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected Settings (Gear) menu
And the user has selected Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When the user taps the green plus sign next to multiple teams
custom_expected:
Then multiple teams appear under the Favorite Teams section
And the teams appear in the order that they were tapped

title: Settings (Favorite Teams): Verify you can remove a Favorite Team by selecting the red minus next to the team and then selecting the delete button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And the user has selected Favorite Teams
And the user has a Favorite Team set
custom_steps:
When we tap the red minus next to a Favorite Team
And tap the delete button for that Favorite Team
custom_expected: Then the Favorite Team is removed from the Favorite Teams section

title: Settings (Home Screen): Verify setting each of the different Home Screen options allows the application to open to that particular Home Screen
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And we have selected Home Screen
custom_steps:
When we tap a setting
And quit the application
And open the application
custom_expected:
Then the application opens to the Home Screen that was selected

REPEAT for each Setting

title: Settings (Refresh Rate): Verify that the Refresh Rate refreshes appropriately on the scoreboard depending on the value that is selected
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And the user has selected Refresh Rate
custom_steps:
When we tap on a Refresh Option
And we check the Scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the Refresh Rate updates the scoreboard at the correct timing

REPEAT for each Refresh Rate

title: Settings (Screen Auto-Lock): Verify that if we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell that it doesn't highlight blue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed World Baseball Classic
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell
custom_expected: THEN the 'Screen Auto-Lock' cell will NOT be highlighted in blue

title: Settings (Screen Auto-Lock): When Screen Auto-Lock is set to On then the device will lock after a set duration and when set to Off then the device will not lock after a set duration
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And we have selected Screen Auto-Lock
custom_steps:
When Screen Auto-Lock is set to On
Or Screen Auto-Lock is set to Off
custom_expected: Then the device will either lock / stay unlocked depending on the setting that was set

title: Settings (WorldBaseballClassic.com Account): Verify when valid credentials are entered that they return an Account information verified message
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And we have selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account
custom_steps: When we enter valid credentials
custom_expected: Then we see an Account information verified message

title: Settings (WorldBaseballClassic.com Account): Verify when invalid credentials are entered that we receive an Invalid Email/Password message
custom_preconds:
Given we have selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And we have selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account
custom_steps: When we enter incorrect credentials
custom_expected: Then we receive an Invalid Email/Password message

title: Settings (WorldBaseballClassic.com Account): Verify that a Clear Account Information button exists if the user is logged into an account
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And the user has selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account
And the user has already logged into an WorldBaseballClassic.com account
custom_expected: Then a Clear Account Information button is present

title: Settings (WorldBaseballClassic.com Account): Verify that if the Clear Account Information button is tapped that it clears the account information and removes the button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Settings (Gear) menu
And the user has selected WorldBaseballClassic.com Account
And the user has already logged into an WorldBaseballClassic.com account
custom_steps: When we tap Clear Account Information
custom_expected:
Then the account information is cleared
And the Clear Account Information button disappears

title: Settings: Verify that the 'Social Networks' setting is available in Settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have selected the Settings (Gear) menu
custom_steps: WHEN we look through the menu
custom_expected: THEN we will see the Social Networks menu item
